EmailTemplate.subject: {!Contact.FirstName}’s NCS application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Completing {!Contact.FirstName}’s NCS application
Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c <> ""," "& ( Contact.Parent_Name__c ) &" ","Parent or Guardian")},
It’s great that {!Contact.FirstName} wants to take part in NCS. We are The Challenge and run NCS in your area.
Your next steps Click here: https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/ to log in online and use your unique login details below to complete {!Contact.FirstName}’s application:
Your NCS ID: {!Contact.NCS_ID__c} Your parent or guardian activation code: {!Contact.PG_NCS_PIN__c}
Please note that these login details should only be used by the parent or guardian to complete the application. The young person has separate login details because, whilst they can enter initial details, they cannot complete most of the application.
It’s quicker to apply online but if you would like a paper application form instead, please contact us using the details below.
All our dates are subject to availability - so please complete their application and select their preferred dates as soon as possible.
Over 200,000 young people have already taken part. Make sure {!Contact.FirstName} doesn't miss out and sign up now!
The NCS Team - The Challenge
For more info, click on the link below: http://www.ncsthechallenge.org/programme/
Or, Sign Up Now! https://bookings.ncsthechallenge.org/
E: contact@ncsthechallenge.org T: 0203 542 2400 www.NCSTheChallenge.org
